<<<<<<< HEAD
A letter from Sr Matthew Hale, Kt. sometime Lord Chief Justice of England: to one of his sons, after his recovery from the small-pox Hale, Matthew, Sir, 1609-1676.
[2], 37, [1] p.
printed by J. Playford, for W. Shrowsbery, at the sign of the Bible in Duke-lane, London : 1684.
Running title: A letter from Sir M. Hale, to one of his sons. Reproduction of original in the Columbia University Library.
=======
